content.text:
# CMT Music Award for Video of the Year

The MTV Video Music Awards Best Country award debuted in 2025 after originally being part of MTV's CMT Music Awards from 2002 to 2024.
Originally known as the Flameworthy Video of the Year when first awarded in 2002, it was changed in 2005 to Video of the Year.
Following corporate changes at Paramount, the award was moved to the MTV Video Music Awards in 2025, where it is known as Best Country.  The award has been fan voted for the entirety of its duration.
